string.text: Enable IronBloodBattlefield. When enabled, soldiers will not retreat until specific conditions are met. Note: Does not affect Siege Battles
Whether the retreat restrictions also apply to player's troops
When enabled, troops will retreat based on casualty percentage instead of remaining troop count
Enemy troops will be allowed to retreat when their casualties reach this percentage of their total force (5% - 100%)
Player's troops will be allowed to retreat when their casualties reach this percentage of their total force (5% - 100%)
[Fixed Count Mode] Enemy troops will be allowed to retreat when their remaining troops fall below this number
[Fixed Count Mode] Player's troops will be allowed to retreat when their remaining troops fall below this number
[Fixed Count Mode] Time in seconds that troops must remain below the threshold before retreat is allowed. Reinforcements arriving will reset this timer
